item.title: The Red Jumpsuit Apparatus - Face Down
item.description:
Hey girl you know
you drive me crazy
One look puts
the rhythm in my head
Still I’ll never
understand
Why you
hang around
I see
what’s going down
Cover up with makeup
in the mirror
Tell
yourself
It’s never gonna
happen again
You cry alone and then
he swears he loves you
Do you feel
like a man
When you
push her around?
Do you feel
better now
As she falls
to the ground?
Well I’ll tell you
my friend
One day this world’s
going to end
As your lies
crumble down
A new life
she has found
A pebble in the water
makes a ripple effect
Every action
in this world
Will bear
a consequence
If you wade
around forever
You will
surely drown
I see
what’s going down
I see
the way you go and
Say you’re
right again
Say you’re right again
heed my lecture
Do you feel
like a man
When you
push her around?
Do you feel
better now
As she falls
to the ground?
Well I’ll tell you
my friend
One day this world’s
going to end
As your lies
crumble down
A new life
she has found
Face down
in the dirt
She said
this doesn’t hurt
She said
I finally had enough
Face down
in the dirt
She said
this doesn’t hurt
She said
I finally had enough
One day
she will tell you
That she
had enough
It’s coming
round again
Do you feel
like a man
When you
push her around?
Do you feel
better now
As she falls
to the ground?
Well I’ll tell you
my friend
One day this world’s
going to end
As your lies
crumble down
A new life
she has found
Do you feel
like a man
When you
push her around?
Do you feel
better now
As she falls
to the ground?
Well I’ll tell you
my friend
One day this world’s
going to end
As your lies
crumble down
A new life
she has found
Face down
in the dirt
She said
this doesn’t hurt
She said
I finally had enough
